TestCase.name: testIntersectAll
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT ALL SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject($f0=[IF(>($1, $2), $2, $1)], c=[$0]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($1, 1), >=($2, 1))]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], vcol_left_cnt=[COUNT($1)], vcol_right_cnt=[COUNT($2)]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$REPLICATE_ROWS$1($0, $1)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) c)])

TestCase.name: testIntersectAllLeftIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 WHERE 1=0 INTERSECT ALL SELECT f FROM T2

LogicalIntersect(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject($f0=[IF(>($1, $2), $2, $1)], c=[$0]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($1, 1), >=($2, 1))]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], vcol_left_cnt=[COUNT($1)], vcol_right_cnt=[COUNT($2)]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$REPLICATE_ROWS$1($0, $1)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) c)])

TestCase.name: testIntersectAllRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM T1 INTERSECT ALL SELECT f FROM T2 WHERE 1=0

LogicalIntersect(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject($f0=[IF(>($1, $2), $2, $1)], c=[$0]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($1, 1), >=($2, 1))]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], vcol_left_cnt=[COUNT($1)], vcol_right_cnt=[COUNT($2)]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[f]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$REPLICATE_ROWS$1($0, $1)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) c)])

TestCase.name: testIntersectAllWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM ((SELECT * FROM T1) INTERSECT ALL (SELECT * FROM T2)) WHERE a > 1

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) +- LogicalIntersect(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, e, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject($f0=[IF(>($3, $4), $4, $3)], a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($3, 1), >=($4, 1))]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], vcol_left_cnt=[COUNT($3)], vcol_right_cnt=[COUNT($4)]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, e, f]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, e, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[$REPLICATE_ROWS$1($0, $1, $2, $3)], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c)])
